ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.models

Class Question

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.models.GenericResponse
      • ca.ualberta.cs.queueunderflow.models.Question

  • public class Question
extends GenericResponse
    The Class Question. A model that will hold all of the information pertinent to a question (via inheritance from GenericResponse) and Contains an AnswerList to add & get answers to the question.
    Version:
    0.5
    Author:
    group 10
